sentences.en: A little starchy at the beginning but all sweet stuff at the end.
sentences.cn: 起初总有点刻板,但所有的甜点都在最后.

sentences.en: And Satan peeled off the healthful skin and sliced starchy center into chips and deep - fried them.
sentences.cn: 撒旦剥去了有益健康的皮并且切成薄片和薯条油炸它们.

sentences.en: Boston - based researchers , writing in the journal Obesity, found mice fed starchy foods developed the disease.
sentences.cn: 在肥胖杂志担任书写工作并以波士顿为研究室的研究学者, 发现喂食老鼠淀粉类食物会造成疾病.

sentences.en: Golfers should avoid starchy foods like potatoes , white breads , corn, and foods high in sugars.
sentences.cn: 高尔夫营养与日常营养相较, 有很多相同的特性.

sentences.en: He eat too much starchy food.
sentences.cn: 他贪吃含淀粉多的食物。

sentences.en: He eats too much starchy food.
sentences.cn: 他贪吃含淀粉多的食物.

sentences.en: However , in case of emergency , all three starchy crops could be used as substitute energy resources.
sentences.cn: 总之, 这些淀粉作物在非常时期将可被用为一种替代能源.

sentences.en: Most starchy foods have at least a small amount of resistant starch in them.
sentences.cn: 大多数的淀粉食物在他们里面有至少很少反抗的淀粉.

sentences.en: Starching treatment helps cooking materials keep their water content and make dishes taste tender and starchy.
sentences.cn: 烹饪原料经过上浆加工,能保持水分,使烹制的菜肴质感滑嫩.

sentences.en: The characteristic of method is to supplement a nitrogen source to the starchy raw materials.
sentences.cn: 向所述薯类原料中补充氮源.

sentences.en: The glycemic index concept, ilsted GI value of some starchy foods were introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍血糖指数的概念和一些常见淀粉食品的血糖指数.

sentences.en: Thiamine changes starchy foods into energy.
sentences.cn: 硫胺将淀粉类食物转变为能量.

sentences.en: Wheat kernels differ from vitreous and starchy with different hardness.
sentences.cn: 小麦分角质和粉质,其结构的软硬程度也有所不同.

words.tran_cn: 完全的；荒凉的；刻板的；光秃秃的；朴实的
完全；明显地；突出地；质朴地
含淀粉的；浆糊状的；刻板的

trans.tran_cn: （食物）含大量淀粉的，刻板的，拘谨的
